net.hudup.core.alg

Interface RecommendFilter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    @NextUpdate
public interface RecommendFilter
extends java.io.Serializable
    This interface represents a filter which is performed before any recommendation tasks. As a convention, this interface is called filter. Any class that implements this interface must implements two its methods as follows:
    • Method filter(Dataset, RecommendFilterParam) is responsible for performing actually filtering tasks before any recommendations. For example, the method Recommender.recommend(...) will call this method before producing a list of recommended items. Suppose every item have types 1, 2, 3, an example of filtering task is to select only type-1 items for recommendation task, which means that the list of recommended items produced by the method Recommender.recommend(...) later contains only type-1 items.
    • Method prepare(RecommendParam) is responsible for setting up (preparing) the recommendation parameter represented by RecommendParam before doing the filtering tasks in filter(Dataset, RecommendFilterParam) method.
    Version:
    10.0
    Author:
    Loc Nguyen

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean filter(Dataset dataset, RecommendFilterParam param)
      This method is responsible for performing actually filtering tasks before any recommendations.
      void prepare(RecommendParam param)
      This method is responsible for setting up (preparing) the recommendation parameter represented by RecommendParam class before doing the filtering tasks in filter(Dataset, RecommendFilterParam) method.

    • Method Detail

      • filter

        boolean filter(Dataset dataset,
               RecommendFilterParam param)
        This method is responsible for performing actually filtering tasks before any recommendations. For example, the method Recommender.recommend(...) will call this method before producing a list of recommended items. The filtering tasks are based on specified dataset and specified filter parameter represented by RecommendFilterParam class.
        Parameters:
        dataset - specified dataset.
        param - specified filter parameter represented by RecommendFilterParam class.
        Returns:
        whether or not filtering tasks are performed successfully.

      • prepare

        void prepare(RecommendParam param)
        This method is responsible for setting up (preparing) the recommendation parameter represented by RecommendParam class before doing the filtering tasks in filter(Dataset, RecommendFilterParam) method. The preparation is based on the input parameter as param.
        Parameters:
        param - recommendation parameter specified by RecommendParam class.
